name: Amidala's Blaster
Lore: 'Amidala''s ability as a warrior is underestimated by those who encounter her. With her weapon of choice, she often uses this fact to her advantage.',
Text: 'Deploy on Amidala. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Character is power and forfeit = 0 if destiny > defense value. Creature lost if destiny +2 > defense value.',
